title: Russia claims Apple has paid $13.4M antitrust fine
description:
Russia’s Federal Antimonopoly Service (FAS) claims that Apple has paid a $13.4 million fine relating to anti-competitive practices. According to Russian news agency TASS, the fine – originally levied at 1.2 billion rubles (then worth $17.4 million) in September 2022 – was confirmed as received by Russian authorities. “On January 19, 2024, Apple paid the... Read more »

The post Russia claims Apple has paid $13.4M antitrust fine appeared first on Developer Tech News.
